title: Wall Street Breakfast August 12:  The Inflation Conundrum
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Our top stories today: The debate over inflation continues as more data on the input side is released before the opening bell, the FDA is set to amend emergency use authorizations for COVID-19 vaccines to allow immuno-compromised people to receive a third shot and talks between DoorDash and Instacart fail over regulatory concerns. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
